property.name: Text
property.value:
When you announce your agenda, name a House. Ignore the out-of-House gold penalty when playing cards or placing setup cards with that affiliation.
Your out-of-House character and attachment cards gain "prized 1" while leaving play. Your out-of-House location cards with that affiliation gain "prized 2" while leaving play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Your plot deck must contain exactly 10 plot cards.
Each of your plot cards gain "prized 1" while moving to your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a [POW] challenge in which Seasoned Smuggler participated, choose and stand a prized card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Bitterbridge to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot trigger its abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Lord or Lady character, the losing player much choose 1 location he or she controls. Then, choose and take control of a different non-limited location under that player's control.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win a challenge in which Enraged Crewman participated by 4 or more STR as the attacker, the challenge is considered unopposed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance, discard all locations from play. You cannot play locations for the rest of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Frey Armsmen gets +2 STR during [MIL] challenges for each House Frey chracter you control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gainst the Traitor trait.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, treat it as if its printed text box were blank.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a prized card is discarded from an opponent's hand, claim power for your House equal to that card's prized value.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Spy from Starfall is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, kneel 2 influence to choose and discard an attacking character from play. Then, search the deck and hand of that character's controller for any number of copies of that character and discard them. Then, shuffle the deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Cately Stark leaves play, choose a non-Army [Stark] character in your dead pile and put that character into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Play after you win a [MIL] challenge as the defender. Immediately after the resolution of the current challenge, a [MIL] challenge is initiated against the losing opponent with you as the attacking player and your currently defending characters as your only attacking characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you control Young Griff, discard Young Griff from play.
Non-Dragon characters without attachments get -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an attachment enters play, choose a player. Look at the player's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a player counts income, he or she must choose and kill a character he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you count income, pay 1 gold to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you claim power for the prized keyword, claim 1 additional power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, reveal the top X cards of your deck and add them to your hand. X is the number of River plot cards in your used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knight of the Songs gets +1 STR for each prized character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you control a [Stark] character, Rider from Storm's End gets +1 STR.
If you control a [Lannister] character, Rider from Storm's End gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Until the end of the phase, each prized character you control gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge in which Wex Pyke participated, choose 1 prized card in your dead or discard pile and return it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player declares a Naval attacker or defender, put a Warship location into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character with a printed cost that is less than the number of characters in its controller's dead pile comes into play knelt.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you control a Start character, Frey Emissary gets +1 STR.
If you control a [Baratheon] character, Frey Emissary gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After an opponent reveals a plot card, kneel a unique [Lannister] character to cancel the revealing of that plot and move it to its owner's used pile. That player must choose and reveal a new plot card. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge as the defender, reveal the top 2 cards of you deck. Put all revealed prized cards into your hand. return all non-prized cards to the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Blood Orange Grove to choose a character with a crest. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all crests and gains a challenge icon of your choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile. Then choose a character and either an [INT] or [POW] icon. Until the end of the phase, the chosen character loses that icon and Desert Raider gains it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose a card in any player's discard or dead pile. Shuffle that card back into its owner's deck. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Your characters get +1 STR if you control fewer characters than each opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Unique [Stark] character only.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, opponents cannot trigger effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Viserys Targaryen to choose and discard an attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains a [POW] icon, and during [POW] challenges gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are running the Neutral Faction House card, Shagwell gains, "Response: After you play a Mercenary character, choose and kneel a non-Army character. (Limit once per round.)"

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Vargo Hoat enters play, choose and kneel any player's House card. You may discard a character agenda from that House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and discard an attachment from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Knight of the north is participating in a chalenge, character with more than 1 icon do not count their STR

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gets +1 STR.
Response: After you win a challenge in wich attached character participated, kneel Heartsbane to stand attached character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays a character from his or her hand, discard Orkmont Reaver from play (cannot be saved) to kill that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard a card from your hand to turn Iron Islands Marines into an Army character with 3 STR, deadly, a [MIL] icon, and a [POW] icon until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Discard Longship Iron Victory (cannot be saved) to choose and kill 1 participating character (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value:
Tyrion Lannister gains a [MIL] icon.
Each card discarded from an opponent's hand reduces his or her draw cap by 1 (to a minimum of 0) until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel The Mander to draw 1 card. (2 cards instead if any player has a prized plot revealed.)

card.name: There Are No Men Like Me

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [MIL] icon and does not kneel to attack or defend during [MIL] challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first event card played by an opponent each round gains "prized 1" if The Bastard of Godsgrace is standing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, discard 1 gold token from a character you control to reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you count income, count 2 additional gold if you control fewer characters than each opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: If you control fewer characters than each opponent, kneel The Children's Tower to search the top 5 cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Then shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: While attached character is participating in a challenge, discard Ice to choose and kill up to X characters. X is the number of prized card you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If it is not Winter, after attached character is declared as defender, kneel Blackfyre to remove all characters without attachments from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown and does not kneel to attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel House Bannerman to ignore all gold penalties on the next card you play this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Septon Utt enters or leave play, draw 1 card if you are running the Neutral Faction House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Zollo, choose an opponent. Move all gold from that player's gold pool to yours.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Search your deck for a prized card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is equal to the number of different House affiliations among the characters you control. (Each character cannot contribute more than 1 House affiliation to this count.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel a [Baratheon] character to lower the cost of the next character you play this phase by X, where X is the number of prized cards you control. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Lyseni Captain, pay 2 gold to move all power from a character to Lyseni Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose an opponent. That opponent must choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Great Wyk to choose another location. Kneel or stand that location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel King of the Isles. Then, until the end of the round King of the Isles gains: "Response: Kneel attached House card to cancel a triggered effect."

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challegne, search your deck for a Warship location, reveeal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, reveal a card from the loosing opponent's hand at random. You may put that card into play under your control, if able. Otherwise, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's character is knelt by one of your card effects, choose and kneel a location. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose and kneel a character. Discard all power on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel a prized character to cancel the effects of a character ability just triggered.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those cards to your hand, and shuffle the others back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Hoster Tully leaves play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for any number of House Tully cards, reveal them and add them to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Blackfish is attacking, each character that dies for [MIL] claim gains "prized 1."

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose a character. That character gains stealth and "does not kneel to defend" until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Horselord is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you declare Daenerys Targaryen as an attacker, choose a character without attachments controlled by defending player. If you win the challenge, kill that character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to your House card.
Response: After you play a prized card, kneel attached House card to choose a character. That character gains deadly and "Does not kneel to attack or defend during [POW] challenges" until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Harrenhal has 3 or more gold tokens on it, discard it from play (cannot be saved).
Response: Kill a character you control to cancel a triggered effect. Then, place 1 gold token on Harrenhal.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to the Neutral Faction House card.
Response: After a neutral character you own leaves play, kneel attached House card to attach that character facedown to The Brave Companions instead.
Marshalling: Kneel attached House card to return an attached facedown character to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You cannot have more than 1 copy of each event card by title in your deck. You cannot trigger event card effects from your dead or discard pile.
Response: After you play an event card, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Defenders of the Wall may be declared as a defender during [MIL] challenges initiated against you by players running an agenda even if it is already kneeling.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Deserted Castle to choose a [Baratheon] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains the Night’s Watch trait.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If it is Winter, each of your Night’s Watch characters gains a [POW] icon and the [Baratheon] affiliation.
Any Phase: Kneel The Wall to stand all Night’s Watch characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you control a [Martell] character, Lonely Light Envoy gains an [INT] icon.
If you control a [Targaryen] character, Lonely Light Envoy gains "immune to plot effects."

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If you are the first player, bring Farwynd Explorer out of Shadows to cancel a triggered effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Longship Iron Wind to put a character with printed cost 2 or lower into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ashemark Councilor is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent’s hand, reveal the top card of your deck and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you control a [Greyjoy] character, House Dayne Escort gains deadly.
If you control a [Taragaryen] character, House Dayne Escort gains "immune to plot effects."

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Seneschal Ricasso leaves play, choose a prized character in your dead or discard pile and put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose an opponent who controls more characters than you. You may declare an additional [INT] challenge against that opponent this phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While Riverlands Hunter is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Hand of the King to stand attached character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Prized 1. Lord or Lady character only.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gains deadly.
Response: After Black Dragon Egg leaves play, search your deck for a copy of Drogon or Black Hatchling, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gains melee.
Response: After Green Dragon Egg leaves play, search your deck for a copy of Rhaegal or Green Hatchling, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached character gains stealth.
Response: After White Dragon Egg leaves play, search your deck for a copy of Viserion or White Hatchling, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

card.name: In the Hands of the Qohorik

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: Choose an opponent. That player must choose his or her next plot card this phase at random.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel the effects of an event card just played. (Non-prized event cards cannot cancel this effect.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Each opponent discards the top 2 cards from his or her deck for each character in his or her dead pile. (Limit 1 per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the marshalling phase, each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. All characters not chosen are discarded from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which a prized character participated, Robert Baratheon claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel 2 influence to choose a non-Army character without attachments. Take control of that character until the end of the challenges phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Raider from Orkwood is participating in a challenge, characters with more than 1 icon do not count their STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Orkwood Captain participated as an attacker, kneel all locations controlled by the defending player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Ten Towers to discard X cards from the top of the losing player’s deck. X is the amount of STR by which you won the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Ser Balon Swann comes out of Shadows, each opponent with 4 or more cards in hand chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel a unique [Lannister] character to choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent plays or reveals a prized card, each player chooses up to 3 characters he or she controls. All characters not chosen are returned to their owners’ hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a { character to choose a character without a crest. Return that character to its owner’s hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control a [Stark] character, Northern Clansman gains renown. If you control a [Lannister] character, Northern Clansman gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blackwood Elite must be chosen for [Military] claim, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Mad King Aerys cannot be killed unless an opponent controls a [Noble] character or Ser Jaime Lannister.
Dominance: Kneel Mad King Aerys to choose and kill a [Noble] character.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control a [Greyjoy] character, Dragon Ambassador gains deadly. If you control a [Martell] character, Dragon Ambassador gains an [INT] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a [Military] or [Intrigue] challenge as the attacker, cancel the claim effect of that challenge. Then, move up to 3 power from the losing opponent’s House card to your House card. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: The Iron Throne cannot stand during the standing phase or by other card effects. If you are the only player to control The Iron Throne, players cannot trigger response effects while The Iron Throne is standing. After a player wins a challenge, that player may choose to stand or kneel The Iron Throne.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel Sellsail Galley to search your deck or your discard pile for a character with a [Naval] enhancement, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck if it was searched.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and kneel a non-prized character

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have a [Targaryen] House card search your deck for a [Martell] card. If you have a [Martell] House card search your deck for a [Greyjoy] card. Reveal and add that card to your hand and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have a [Lannister] House card search your deck for a [Baratheon] card. If you have a [Baratheon] House card search your deck for a [Stark] card. Reveal and add that card to your hand and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have a [Stark] House card search your deck for a [Lannister] card. If you have a [Greyjoy] House card search your deck for a [Targaryen] card. Reveal and add that card to your hand and shuffle your deck.
